file.name: oapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 0.1.0
  title: rolling shutter keyper
  description: This describes the rolling shutter's keyper API
  contact:
    name: shutter-network
    url: http://shutter.network/
  license:
    name: MIT
paths:
  /ping:
    get:
      description: |
        Pings the server
      operationId: ping
      parameters:

  /eons:
    get:
      description: |
        Get information about all started
      operationId: getEons
      parameters:
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Information about all started eons
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Eons"
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"

  /decryptionKey/{eon}/{epochID}:
    get:
      description: Get the decryption key for an epoch ID
      operationId: getDecryptionKey
      parameters:
        - name: eon
          in: path
          description: Eon of the decryption key to get
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            minimum: 0
        - name: epochID
          in: path
          description: Epoch ID of the decryption key to get
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/EpochID"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: The decryption key
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/DecryptionKey"
        "404":
          description: error if the decryption key has not been generated yet
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"

  /decryptionTrigger:
    post:
      description: Trigger decryption key generation for an epoch
      operationId: SubmitDecryptionTrigger
      requestBody:
        description: A decryption trigger specifying epoch and block number
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/DecryptionTrigger"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: success
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"

components:
  schemas:
    EpochID:
      type: string
      pattern: "^0x[0-9a-f]{16}$"

    DecryptionKey:
      type: string
      pattern: "^0x[0-9a-f]{16}$"

    DecryptionTrigger:
      type: object
      required:
        - epoch_id
        - block_number
      properties:
        epoch_id:
          type: string
          pattern: "^0x[0-9a-f]{16}$"
        block_number:
          type: integer
          minimum: 0

    Eon:
      type: object
      required:
        - index
        - activation_block_number
        - eon_key
        - finished
        - successful
      properties:
        index:
          type: integer
          minimum: 0
        activation_block_number:
          type: integer
          minimum: 0
        eon_key:
          type: string
          pattern: "^0x[0-9a-f]{16}$"
        finished:
          type: boolean
        successful:
          type: boolean

    Eons:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Eon"

    Error:
      type: object
      required:
        - code
        - message
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        message:
          type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/ping": get: operation "ping": at 1:2817: responses: no responses
